Package projeto_ed.Heaps

Class ArrayHeap<T>

java.lang.Object
projeto_ed.Trees.ArrayBinaryTree<T>
projeto_ed.Heaps.ArrayHeap<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeapADT<T>, BinaryTreeADT<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
PriorityQueue
public class ArrayHeap<T> extends ArrayBinaryTree<T> implements HeapADT<T>
ArrayHeap provides an array implementation of a minheap.

  • Method Details

    • addElement

      public void addElement(T obj)
      Adds the specified element to this heap in the appropriate position according to its key value. Note that equal elements are added to the right.
      Specified by:
      addElement in interface HeapADT<T>
      Parameters:
      obj - the element to be added to this heap

    • removeMin

      public T removeMin() throws EmptyCollectionException
      Remove the element with the lowest value in this heap and returns a reference to it. Throws an EmptyCollectionException if the heap is empty.
      Specified by:
      removeMin in interface HeapADT<T>
      Returns:
      a reference to the element with the lowest value in this head
      Throws:
      EmptyCollectionException - if an empty collection exception occurs

      Returns:
